author: USA TODAY, Kevin Johnson, John Fritze and Rebecca Morin, USA TODAY
title: Who decides when and how America re-opens from its coronavirus shutdown?
description: Who decides when and how America re-opens for business? Clash looms between Trump and governors on when it's time to emerge from pandemic shutdown.
content:
President Donald Trump declared a national emergency to fight the coronavirus pandemic. Here's what that actually means.
USA TODAY
